title: Mammoth
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Sandwich shop with large beer selection and neighborhood atmosphere. Could veganize a sandwich or build your own. All bread is vegan suitable. Mustards, bbq sauce, oil and vinegar, and cranberry sauce are the vegan condiments. The chips and sides are not vegan outside of the lentil salad.
